column6: Something beyond comprehension is happening to the children on this street, in this school of mutants. One group of kids has taken it upon themselves as a last resort to try and stop it. Those kids are: The New Mutants.
column8: | writer:Nunzio DeFilippis | penciller (cover):Randall Green | inker:Rick Ketcham | colorist:Peter Pantazis | penciller:Michael Ryan | letterer:Dave Sharpe
